org.apache.maven.archiva.webdav
Class BypassSecuritySystem

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.plexus.redback.system.DefaultSecuritySystem
      org.apache.maven.archiva.webdav.BypassSecuritySystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.codehaus.plexus.redback.system.SecuritySystem
public class BypassSecuritySystem
extends org.codehaus.plexus.redback.system.DefaultSecuritySystem
implements org.codehaus.plexus.redback.system.SecuritySystem

BypassSecuritySystem - used to bypass the security system for testing reasons and allow for every request to respond as success / true.
